name: BUG (Gamaste)
description:
Experience the world's first ever 'Bug' type game, featuring gameplay such as 'walking from point A to point B' and 'shooting of the guns.' 

A living, breathing world that evolves as you progress, constantly growing in size and danger.

A variety of weapons to aid your survival in the world of BUG. 

(It's really bad pls don't judge).
